overview:
## Discussion

If this image was created using the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage/init(cgImage:)] or [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage/init(contentsOf:)] initializer, this property’s value is the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGImage] object that provides the image’s underlying image data. Otherwise, this property’s value is `nil`—in this case you can obtain a CoreGraphics image by rendering the image with the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIContext] [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIContext/createCGImage(_:from:)] method.

# cgImage

**Instance Property**

The CoreGraphics image object this image was created from, if applicable.

## Declaration

```swift
var cgImage: CGImage? { get }
```

## Discussion

If this image was created using the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage/init(cgImage:)] or [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage/init(contentsOf:)] initializer, this property’s value is the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGImage] object that provides the image’s underlying image data. Otherwise, this property’s value is `nil`—in this case you can obtain a CoreGraphics image by rendering the image with the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIContext] [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIContext/createCGImage(_:from:)] method.

## Accessing Original Image Content

- **pixelBuffer**: The CoreVideo pixel buffer this image was created from, if applicable.
- **depthData**: Depth data associated with the image.
- **portraitEffectsMatte**: The portrait effects matte associated with the image.
- **semanticSegmentationMatte**
